    • Constructor Detail

      • ScriptProgram

        public ScriptProgram(boolean linkLibs,
             ScriptSource... scriptSources)
        Create a new ScriptProgram with the given sources. The program is not compiled or executable until the compile method is called.
        Parameters:
        linkLibs - whether or not the standard SnapScript libraries should be automatically linked (usually should be true)
        scriptSources - the sources to compile

        public boolean compile()

        public ScriptCompilationException getLastCompileError()

      • initRuntime

        public void initRuntime(boolean useDoubleStore)
                 throws ScriptInvocationException
        Initializes the script engine runtime after successful compilation.
        Parameters:
        useDoubleStore - if true, the script engine will store 'float' data types as Java doubles, otherwise they will be stored as Java floats
        Throws:
        ScriptInvocationException - if the ScriptEngine encounters an initialization error
